title: Victorious Skin Exclusivity
body: As a player who strays away from ranked as I fear I'm just going to get thrashed by players of a much higher skill level, I am displeased at the exclusivity of the Victorious Skins, especially Morgana, a champion I play a lot of. What I'm saying is that sure, those who have made it to Gold in season 4 can get the Victorious skin for free for their hard work, but why not allow it to be up for sale for those who can buy it with RP who haven't made it to gold or for those who just don't feel like playing ranked such as me. I'd also love to know everyone else's opinions on the topic on whether or not Victorious skins should be available for RP.

replies.body: Morg already has enough good skins.

If you don't play ranked then that's your choice, but if you choose not to, then don't whine when you don't get Victorious skins. Victorious skins are designed as something that demonstrates achievement and sportsmanship, while this idea would make a scrubby s4 bronzie like me happy, it completely defeats the purpose of earning it by placing gold and higher, so it's a resounding no from me.

Those who play ranked and get into gold get it for free. Wouldn't you rather be like "I got a skin for free, while all these scrubs have to pay for it". Personally I see as more of an achievement. But that's just me.

But on the opposite end of the spectrum, most players will probably be like: "Lol why should I go through hundreds of %%%%%%s when I can get the exact same reward for 975 RP only without the hassle of said %%%%%%s?
Stop being a f2p pleb and git gud
